grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 徐々に【ジョジョニ】gradually, steadily, slowly, little by little, step by step, by degrees
徐々【ジョジョ】slow, gradual, steady, calm, composed, relaxed
緩徐【カンジョ】gentle and quiet
kun reading compounds: 徐ろに【おもむろに】suddenly, abruptly, deliberately, slowly, gently
